chapter.title: Changes to &PRODUCT; for Specific Audiences
chapter.para: Some new features, enhancements, and bug fixes don't always apply to all users of an &PRODUCT; system, but rather are intended for specific audiences, such as users of a particular managed device type.

section.title: Changes since &LASTPRODVER;
section.para: The following specific-audience changes have have gone into effect since &PRODUCT; &LASTPRODVER;

para.emphasis: No new changes for developers have been reported.
